description: Historic port town and former capital of the Hawaiian Kingdom (impacted by 2023 fires).
Bustling beach town with condos, beach parks, and consistent sunny weather.
Historic county seat nestled at the base of the West Maui Mountains, known for local boutiques.
The island's main commercial center, hosting the airport, harbor, and big-box retail.
Eclectic surf town with colorful storefronts, health food stores, and art galleries.
Lush, rural community on the rainy windward side, known for jungle valleys and privacy.
Isolated, traditional town at the end of the Hana Highway, steeped in Hawaiian culture.
Historic paniolo (cowboy) town with a vibrant arts scene and rustic architecture.
Rustic agricultural district on the upper slopes of HaleakalƒÅ, known for protea farms and views.
"Hole in the Heavens," a residential golf community serving as a gateway to Upcountry.
